params.title: 🎉 Welcome Back! It's Been 5 Years...
params.content:
🎉 Welcome Back!

You were last here on January 6, 2020

That's 1,836 days ago (about 5 years!)

⏰ Time Gap Context
A LOT has changed since 2020. This briefing is calibrated for someone returning after a long absence. Take it slow, be patient with yourself, and don't expect to be productive immediately.

🎯 Today's Focus: Fresh Start

After 5 years, this isn't about picking up where you left off. Treat today as Day 1 of a new journey. No pressure, no expectations.

📋 Gentle Priorities (No Rush!)

  • 🔍 Explore - Click around, open programs, get comfortable
  • 🧹 Fresh mindset - Don't try to remember old workflows
  • 📝 One small task - Just open Notepad and write something
  • 🎯 Set one goal - What do you want to accomplish this week?
💡 AI Guidance
You might feel rusty or overwhelmed. That's completely normal. The goal today isn't productivity - it's rediscovery and comfort. Spend 10 minutes just exploring the interface. Open programs, move windows around, play Solitaire if you want. Build comfort first, efficiency later.

⏰ Suggested Approach (Very Gentle)

First 30 minutes • Exploration
No tasks. Just click around. Open Notepad, Paint, Calculator. Get reacquainted.
Next 30 minutes • Light activity
Open Notepad. Write a journal entry about being back. That's it.
Rest of session • One tiny task
Pick ONE small thing and complete it. Build momentum gently.

📅 What Happened Since January 2020?

• COVID-19 pandemic - Changed how everyone works

• Remote work boom - Working from home became normal

• AI revolution - ChatGPT, AI assistants everywhere (like this one!)

• Your old workflows - Probably don't apply anymore. Start fresh.

✨ Today's Achievement
You showed up. After 5 years, that's huge. Everything else is bonus.

🤖 This briefing was generated based on your 5-year absence

Next briefing will be calibrated differently based on your activity

Published: Tuesday, January 15, 2025 at 8:00 AM
